thread.title: Daily Deal: Save 56% on a 128GB EVO+ microSD card
thread.title_full: Daily Deal: Save 56% on a 128GB EVO+ microSD card

author: Josh L.
title: Daily Deal: Save 56% on a 128GB EVO+ microSD card
text:
Josh L. / 4 hours ago 
Another day, another deal. For today’s promotion, you can pick up a 128GB Evo+ microSD card for $44.99 (56% off). If you’ve been following SamMobile closely over the course of the past few months, you’re probably familiar with the Evo+ range as we’ve featured discounts on a handful of different products as part of our Daily Deal segment. 
If you’re not, no worries. It’s one of Samsung’s microSD card ranges, which is notorious for offering one of the fastest transfer speeds on the market; making the cards perfect for storing high-resolution pictures and videos. They’re also waterproof and resistant to extreme temperatures — so you have peace of mind that your content is safe. 
Like the sound of the 128GB Evo+ microSD card and want to take advantage of this promotion? All you have to do is hit the Buy Now button below. We strongly advise you to hurry, though, as Amazon only has a limited amount of inventory available for this specific deal and it’s available worldwide, meaning it probably won’t be around for long.
